name: sncf.js
description: An easy to use javascript module to get all the information in real time about the trains Â©SNCF (only in France)

scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.docs:prep: tsc && api-extractor run --local --verbose && api-documenter markdown --input-folder=./temp/ --output-folder=./docs-src/api && rm -rf ./temp
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:prep && vitepress dev docs-src
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prep && vitepress build docs-src

author: Alexis06030631
